reg_pit.title: Retention of Fees for Training Program Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 174/2017, effective September 22, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Retention of Fees for Training Program Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 302/2016, January 23, 2017]

bcl:section.bcl:text: The go2 Tourism HR Society is authorized to retain, as remuneration for all services performed, the fees for training programs set and collected under item 60 of Schedule 1 to the Liquor Control and Licensing Regulation.
Unless earlier repealed, this regulation is repealed on September 30, 2017.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Financial Administration Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 138, section 14]

change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 302/2016, effective January 23, 2017.

bcl:section.bcl:text: The go2 Tourism HR Society is authorized to retain, as remuneration for all services performed, the fees for training programs set and collected under item 35 of Schedule 1 to the Liquor Control and Licensing Regulation.
